metadata.feature_description: Analytics for discussion forums showing thread activity and participation metrics

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics panel should open and display analytics data
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel opens but displays a completely blank/white screen. JavaScript error in console: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics panel from loading: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Attempt to access Discussions tab in Community Analytics
steps.expected: Discussions tab should be accessible with thread metrics displayed
steps.actual: Cannot access Discussions tab because Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Community Analytics panel crashes on load, preventing access to Discussions tab and thread metrics

steps.action: Attempt to view reply rates and engagement data
steps.expected: Reply rates and engagement metrics should be visible in Discussions analytics
steps.actual: Cannot view reply rates because Community Analytics panel fails to load

issues: Feature inaccessible due to Community Analytics panel crash

steps.action: Attempt to view active discussion topics
steps.expected: Active discussion topics should be displayed
steps.actual: Cannot monitor active topics because Community Analytics panel fails to load

issues: Feature inaccessible due to Community Analytics panel crash

steps.action: Attempt to view thread popularity rankings
steps.expected: Thread popularity rankings should be displayed
steps.actual: Cannot view thread rankings because Community Analytics panel fails to load

issues: Feature inaccessible due to Community Analytics panel crash

steps.action: Attempt to verify discussion-specific analytics data
steps.expected: Discussion-specific data should be displayed and accurate
steps.actual: Cannot verify data because Community Analytics panel fails to load

issues: Feature inaccessible due to Community Analytics panel crash

steps.action: Attempt to analyze discussion trends over different time periods
steps.expected: Discussion trends should be visible with time-based filtering
steps.actual: Cannot analyze trends because Community Analytics panel fails to load

issues: Feature inaccessible due to Community Analytics panel crash

observations: CRITICAL BUG: The entire Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init
The Community Analytics menu item appears in the Dashboard submenu and can be clicked
When clicked, the panel opens but displays only a blank white screen with no content
The error occurs consistently on every attempt to open Community Analytics
This bug blocks all testing of Discussions Module Analytics functionality
Code review shows the feature has API endpoints (GetModuleDashboardInfo, GetModulePopularContent, GetModuleTagStats) that should support Discussions analytics, but UI fails to initialize
Site Analytics (the other Dashboard option) has similar issues with Google Analytics connector warnings, suggesting potential infrastructure/configuration issues
